content: I’m a graduate research assistant and final year Ph.D. student advised by Professor Jay Taneja. I’m interested in the implementation of intelligent systems and applications that use AI techniques to build more efficient and reliable energy systems. Broadly, my research aims to build computing tools to reduce energy poverty in developing countries, making energy systems more accessible, affordable, reliable, and clean.
summary: I’m a graduate research assistant and final year Ph.D. student advised by Professor Jay Taneja. I’m interested in the implementation of intelligent systems and applications that use AI techniques to build more efficient and reliable energy systems.
title: Santiago Correa
